title: The Beggar's Opera and other Eighteenth Century plays
description: The book contains the following plays:Cato by Joseph AddisonJane Shore by Nicholas RoweThe Beggar's Opera by John GayThe Tragedy of Tragedies or Tom Thumb the Great by Henry FieldingThe London Merchant or the History of George Barnwell by George LilloThe Clandestine Marriage by George Colman and David GarrickThe West Indian by Richard Cumberland
author: John Hampden
